text: Coming up on @realmoney on Monday When Short Selling Is Done Right * Short selling is risky * Most individual investors would be better off to avoid short selling * The academic evidence on the effects of short selling on our capital markets is overwhelmingly positive * Short

selling improves the efficiency of security prices, increases liquidity, and positively impacts corporate governance "We don’t like trading agony for money" - Charlie Munger (in his response to my question when I was the "credential bear" at the 2013 Berkshire
